page.description: Opens the 'Customize Checkbox Style' property settings.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Customize CheckBox Style]* dialog can be used to customize how each check box option is displayed. The *[ui:Customize CheckBox Style]* dialog is the same dialog used to create a *[link:custom appearance for RadioButton controls@ux control properties radiobutton custom appearance properties]*. The links below go to the documentation located in the *[ui:RadioButton]* Control section of *[link:Data Control Properties@ux control properties data control properties]*.

item.name: *[link:Checkmark Images and Background Color@ux control properties radiobutton properties checkmark images and background color]*
item.description: Customize the checkmark image and the background color of the RadioButton or CheckBox control.

item.name: *[link:Checkmark Border and Size@ux control properties radiobutton properties checkmark border and size]*
item.description: Settings to adjust the border and size of RadioButton or CheckBox control options.

item.name: *[link:Spacing@ux control properties radiobutton properties spacing]*
item.description: Set the spacing between individual options for a RadioButton or CheckBox control.
